title: Unending
description: Her final choice will decide their fate. Other eighteen-year-olds are getting ready to graduate high school and start the next chapter of their lives. But not me.I have to join my friends to fight in the greatest battle of our lives. And I'm going to have to make the choice to save the one person I thought I had lost forever, or choose to protect the one person I can't live without, risking the chance of losing him all over again.Everything will be decided in this final battle. The fate of Ledarians rests in my hand. Can I save them all?
author: Shane Morgan
